page.title: 02ECOLOGY OF FORTRIE
page.content: In our area we have varying wildlife and plantlife. The most common trees are{Conifers}and{Ashes.}Many people have trees around their houses. There are no large forests in this area. There are patches of wasteland where a prickly plant called{Gorse}grows as well as{rough grass}and{bracken.}On the hills you can find{hares, rabbits and sometimes{deer.}There are{foxes but you don't see them much. They are annoying because they kill some farm animals. There are many kinds of birds. The most common are{Blackbirds, {Crows}and{Sparrows.}The Blackbirds steal fruit from the gardens. The Crow is a nuisance too as it eats crops. There are many wildflowers including {Dandelion, Thistle, Buttercup}and {Daisy. (By Vivian Pirie)
